text: The Philippines has competed at every iteration of the Asian Para Games which was first held in Guangzhou, China. ==Asian Games== ===Medals by Games=== Games Rank Gold Silver Bronze Total 2010 Guangzhou 21 0 4 3 7 2014 Incheon 24 0 5 5 10 2018 Jakarta 11 10 8 11 29 Total 11 10 17 19 46 ==Related pages== *Philippines at the Asian Games ==References== Asian Para Games Category:Asian Para Games
title: Philippines at the Asian Para Games
